text.title: Violent pillow fight injures 30 at United States Military Academy
text.head: Violent pillow fight injures 30 at United States Military Academy
Sources

list.item: Unknown, Associated Press did contribute. "'One hell of a pillow fight' West Point tradition turns violent; 24 concussions" — Fox News , September 06, 2015
Mary Bowerman. "30 cadets injured in bloody pillow fight at West Point" — USA Today , September 6, 2015
